content.raw:
@philipstarkey have you tried the new tooltip?(I fixed a few issues it had today) If so is this good enough or should I readd the time axis on every plot?

Markers at the same time with different labels now add to the old label.

Markers plot widget is now fixed to the top of the scrollarea.

As for your proposed color scheme I'm not quite sure of what you are imagening could you provide a picture or code displaying your idea?
